.agile { position: relative; }

.agile:active, .agile :active, .agile:focus, .agile :focus { outline: none; }

.agile__list { display: block; overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 100%; }

.agile__track { align-items: center; display: flex; justify-content: flex-start; }

.agile--disabled .agile__track, .agile__slide { display: block; }

.splide__container { box-sizing: border-box; position: relative; }

.splide__list { backface-visibility: hidden; display: flex; height: 100%; margin: 0px !important; padding: 0px !important; }

.splide__slide { backface-visibility: hidden; box-sizing: border-box; flex-shrink: 0; margin: 0px; position: relative; list-style-type: none !important; }

.splide__arrow svg { fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); height: 1.2em; width: 1.2em; }

.splide__arrow:hover:not(:disabled) { opacity: 0.9; }

.splide__arrow:disabled { opacity: 0.3; }

.splide__arrow:focus-visible { outline: rgb(0, 187, 255) solid 3px; outline-offset: 3px; }

.splide__pagination__page.is-active { background: rgb(255, 255, 255); transform: scale(1.4); z-index: 1; }

.splide.is-focus-in .splide__pagination__page:focus { outline: rgb(0, 187, 255) solid 3px; outline-offset: 3px; }

.splide__progress__bar { background: rgb(204, 204, 204); height: 3px; }

.splide__slide { -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); }

.splide__slide:focus { outline: 0px; }

@media screen and (-ms-high-contrast:none) {

}

@supports (outline-offset:-3px) {

}

@media screen and (-ms-high-contrast:none) {

.splide__toggle { cursor: pointer; }

.splide__track--nav > .splide__list > .splide__slide.is-active { border: 3px solid rgb(0, 0, 0); }

.splide__arrows--rtl .splide__arrow--next { left: 1em; right: auto; }

.splide__arrows--ttb .splide__arrow--next { bottom: 1em; top: auto; }

.splide__arrows--ttb .splide__arrow--next svg { transform: rotate(90deg); }

        clips: JSON.parse('[\u0022\\\/audio\\\/pronunciation-club.mp3\u0022,\u0022\\\/audio\\\/pronunciation-elevator.mp3\u0022,\u0022\\\/audio\\\/pronunciation-guac.mp3\u0022,\u0022\\\/audio\\\/pronunciation-made-up.mp3\u0022,\u0022\\\/audio\\\/pronunciation-use-it.mp3\u0022]'),
        currentClipIndex: 0,
        audioElement: null,

        init() {
            this.clips = this.shuffleArray(this.clips);
            this.audioElement = new Audio();
        },

        shuffleArray(array) {
            for (let i = array.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
                const j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1));
                [array[i], array[j]] = [array[j], array[i]];
            }
            return array;
        },

        play() {
            this.audioElement.pause();
            this.audioElement.currentTime = 0;
            this.audioElement.src = this.clips[this.currentClipIndex];
            this.audioElement.play();

            this.increment();
        },

        increment() {
            this.currentClipIndex++;

            if (!this.clips[this.currentClipIndex]) {
                this.currentClipIndex = 0;
            }
        }

    {"title":"About","author":"e57de76f-ee6a-45b5-911c-7e92dd1905a5","updated_by":"e57de76f-ee6a-45b5-911c-7e92dd1905a5","page_builder":[{"id":"m1jo32v5","image":"louise-millan.jpg","text":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"I am "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"text":"Louise Millan."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"My journey with photography began as a child, mesmerized by how a simple photo could convey entire stories without a word. Growing up, I developed a deep fascination with the world around me\u2014how light, shadows, and fleeting moments could transform into timeless images. This passion drove me to explore photography in depth, from capturing vibrant street scenes to expansive landscapes and intimate portraits."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Over the years, my work has taken me across diverse settings, where I\u2019ve learned to see beauty in the ordinary, whether it\u2019s the rhythm of a bustling city street or the serenity of a remote landscape. Each frame I capture is about more than just documenting a moment; it\u2019s about sharing the emotions, energy, and stories that unfold within it."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What truly drives me is the connection I build with the people and places I photograph. Whether it\u2019s the depth of a portrait, the dynamic energy of street photography, or the sweeping perspectives of aerial views, my goal is always to reveal something authentic, something that resonates. Outside of my professional work, I\u2019m often traveling, camera in hand, constantly searching for new angles and fresh stories to tell. Photography isn\u2019t just my career\u2014it\u2019s my way of understanding and sharing the world."}]}],"type":"image_text","enabled":true}],"parent":"home"}

primary.reasoning: Button #1 ('Try the Demo') has a vibrant red/orange background, making it stand out as the primary call-to-action. The text is action-oriented, encouraging users to engage with the product.

secondary.reasoning: Button #0 ('Read the Docs →') has a white background, contrasting with the primary button's color. It serves as a secondary action, providing additional information.
